welcome.home: What do you want to do?

help.1: You can... discover the new products... to listen to a book

instruction.play_book: Say: "I want to listen" followed by the title of the book.

choice.select_book: Here is the list of books corresponding to your search, which one do you choose? %s %s %s %s %s %s %s

control.no_input: I don't hear a number, choose one
control.cancel: You don't want to give me a number
control.fallback: Be careful, you only have to give me a number

yesno.already_listen: In the audio book %s, you are at the chapter %s. Do you want to continue?

control.cancel: You don't want to say yes or no to me
control.fallback: That doesn't answer the question, say yes or no

play.ref_empty: You didn't say the name of the reference
play.numberOfChapter: There are %s chapters in the book
play.author: The author of this book is %s

control.cancel: All right, I'm going back to reading
control.fallback: I learn new orders every day

listen.home: What do you want to hear?

control.no_input: Ask me to have her deliver listening
control.Cancel: You didn't have time to read a book
control.Fallback: What book are you interested in ?

error.Not_found: The %s book is unknown in the database

tools.playing_is_compatible: Sorry, this device does not support audio playback

control.fallback: I don't think I'm following you
